title: Safety on outback stations - A snapshot of the Northern Territory's cattle industry

tasks.task: Station managers discussing safety measures in the Northern Territory cattle industry.
subtasks: Exchanging industry experiences and safety practices between station managers.
Onboarding new staff with safety training programs.
Conducting weekly toolbox talks and monthly safety meetings.
Implementing incentives for reporting near misses and safety improvements.
Addressing specific hazards like cattle, horses, motorbikes, and chemicals.
Assessing and training staff on motorbike and quad bike safety.
Providing induction training on chemical handling.
Encouraging communication between staff and management for continuous improvement.
Collaborating with NT WorkSafe for safety guidelines and support.

tasks.task: Thumbs up for safety initiatives in the Northern Territory cattle industry.
